alert.note: Alert for Nottoway (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chesterfield, northeastern Nottoway, northwestern Dinwiddie and southeastern Amelia Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilsons, or near Mannboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sutherland around 1215 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include North Wellville, Winterpock, Earls, Ammon, Church Road, Wellville, Beach, Dominy Corner, Walkers and Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central and south central Virginia.
